channel.title: Chaotic claws?
channel.description:
Are they worth it? Pros/Cons?
I've been reading up on the different strategies on wiki for slayer monsters and a lot of them are suggesting chaotic claws. I wasn't really active when they came out so I'm not sure if they are good or not. I already made the regular chaotic claw just have to make the offhand later to test further. ( I need like... 40k tokens which isn't bad)

item.title: Chaotic claws?
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

Well obviously if they are weak to range or magic you should use that, but for the most part Chaotics get the job done.

Read full topic

item.title: Chaotic claws?
item.dc:creator: @Java-RSPS-Noob Java-RSPS-Noob
item.description:
@Java-RSPS-Noob wrote:

[quote=“rip4d, post:5, topic:526444”][quote author=HcoJustin link=topic=645189.msg4340351#msg4340351 date=1375092008]
The claws are slash, so whenever something is weak to that, yes. The claws are slightly less damage than a CLS with a higher crit chance, and faster attack speed. Accuracy wise they are the same as any other chaotic.
[/quote]Actually, the damage ends up being the same. With auto attacks, yes the damage is less, but the DPS equals out.

Also, on the topic of weaknesses, you shouldn’t have to worry about specific weaknesses such as slash, stab and crush. The only time where you really want to match the specific weakness is against boss monsters. Otherwise, attacking with the same style (melee/magic/ranged) works perfectly fine.[/quote]oh really?

So for kuradel tasks it really won’t matter what I use?

Read full topic

item.title: Chaotic claws?
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

[quote=“HcoJustin, post:4, topic:526444”]The claws are slash, so whenever something is weak to that, yes. The claws are slightly less damage than a CLS with a higher crit chance, and faster attack speed. Accuracy wise they are the same as any other chaotic.[/quote]Actually, the damage ends up being the same. With auto attacks, yes the damage is less, but the DPS equals out.

Also, on the topic of weaknesses, you shouldn’t have to worry about specific weaknesses such as slash, stab and crush. The only time where you really want to match the specific weakness is against boss monsters. Otherwise, attacking with the same style (melee/magic/ranged) works perfectly fine.

Read full topic

item.title: Chaotic claws?
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

The claws are slash, so whenever something is weak to that, yes. The claws are slightly less damage than a CLS with a higher crit chance, and faster attack speed. Accuracy wise they are the same as any other chaotic.

Read full topic

item.title: Chaotic claws?
item.dc:creator: @Java-RSPS-Noob Java-RSPS-Noob
item.description:
@Java-RSPS-Noob wrote:

[quote=“rip4d, post:2, topic:526444”]Yes, chaotic claws are good. They are essentially the best available dual wield weapons for level 80. The way damage calculation works, they do the same damage with abilities as rapiers/longswords, and they have an added critical hit chance, so on average you’ll be hitting higher.[/quote]so whenever I do a task where stab/slash is suggested I should use claws instead?

Read full topic

item.title: Chaotic claws?
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

Yes, chaotic claws are good. They are essentially the best available dual wield weapons for level 80. The way damage calculation works, they do the same damage with abilities as rapiers/longswords, and they have an added critical hit chance, so on average you’ll be hitting higher.

Read full topic
